name: Appie Night Mode
description: Night mode for the Appie site. I think I've covered everything in a sensible way, some parts of the website load images that I had to replace entirely so there I also add a small white border on hover but it's the best I can do.
css:
@-moz-document domain("www.ah.nl") {
.ah-online-icon-after::after,
.ah-online-icon-base::before,
.ah-online-icon::after,
.ah-online-icon::before,
.button--chevron-down::after,
.button--chevron-left::before,
.button--chevron::after,
.header-bar__icon-paragraph::before,
.link--chevron-back::after,
.link--chevron-before::before,
.link--chevron-circle-after::after,
.link--chevron-circle::before,
.link--chevron-down::after,
.link--chevron-front-forward::after,
.link--chevron-up::after,
.link--chevron::after,
.link--close-circle::after,
.legend--full-width,
.price,
.product-controls__item--quantity-input,
.product-controls__item--show-controls::before,
.product-description__title,
.menu-item__button.tab__button.heading--8.color-black--1,
.paragraph--2.color-salmiak--min4.spotlight__title,
.spotlight__link.paragraph--2.color-black--1,
.product__summary,
.hero-tooltip,
.story,
.story__icon-list .list__item,
.-inline-table tr td,
.nasa-number,
.doormat-global,
.product-disclaimer,
.product-cross-sell-lane,
.canvas-page,
.link-color--dark,
.link-color-black--1,
.editorial.edc-container--color-black,
.editorial.edc-container--color-drop,
.hero.edc-container--color-black {
    color: white !important;
}

.color-brown__bg--7,
.shopping-list__actions,
.order-controls.order-controls--continue,
.order-controls.order-controls--continue,
.legend--full-width,
.product,
.navigation__scroll-container,
.list-autosuggest,
.list-sort,
footer,
.list-autosuggest__list .ui-menu-item,
.product-cardview .product-price,
.filter,
.menu,
.spotlight-lane,
.hero-tooltip,
.story,
.nasa-number,
.doormat-global,
.product-disclaimer,
.product-cross-sell-lane,
.canvas-page,
.link-color--dark,
.link-color-black--1,
.rich-content,
.rich-product-collection,
.edc-container.promo.grid-item.large-6.xlarge-4.promo--small.edc-container--clickable.edc-container--has-image.column,
.see-more,
.rich-lane--has-background .rich:not(.rich-product-collection),
.editorial.edc-container--color-black,
.editorial.edc-container--color-drop,
.hero.edc-container--color-black,
.rich-product-group,
.rich.edc-container--color-bonus,
.rich.edc-container--color-promotie {
    background-color: #191919 !important;
}

.grid-item {
    border-color: #191919;
}

.image.image--lazy-load.image--background.js-imageloaded.edc-figure__image {
    background-image: none !important;
}

.image.image--lazy-load.image--background.js-imageloaded.edc-figure__image:hover {
    border-radius: 5px 5px 5px 5px;
    -moz-border-radius: 5px 5px 5px 5px;
    -webkit-border-radius: 5px 5px 5px 5px;
    border: 2px solid #ffffff;
}
}
